title: Angel discusses the importance of speaking Chinese with her children

media:group.media:title: Angel discusses the importance of speaking Chinese with her children
media:group.media:description:
Angel, a participant in our “Being Asian in America” documentary, discusses why she speaks only Chinese with her children and the importance of them learning both English and Chinese. 

This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. 
Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 
For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica
